posts.Title: A Beginner’s Guide to Full Stack Development in Python
posts.Description: In this article, we’ll be exploring Python for full stack web development, popular Python frameworks, and how to build a Django (a Python web framework) app. With organizations increasingly looking to hire Django developers, knowledge of this popular framework can open up rewarding career opportunities.
posts.Author: Steve Yonkeu

posts.Title: Introduction to Python Class Attributes
posts.Description: how they’re used as well as class methods and how to create them.
